title: Can't purchase emotes.
body:
As titles states, have been unable to purchase emotes for the last three days.  The error message I get says:

"Sorry, we couldn't process your transaction at this moment, please try again in a few minutes".

replies.body: Did you fix it? I'm getting the same fucking error. {{item:3151}} {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Having the same problem! Here's a screenshot, been trying the last 3 days, even had a friend log onto my account to try, who can regularly purchase them on his own account... still didn't work! Wanting those emotes so bad!
